emptyStateContent.title: Select a skill from the tree to view details
emptyStateContent.description: Browse through the categories in the sidebar and click on any skill to see detailed information about my experience and related resources.

help.title: How to use the Skills Tree
items: Use the left sidebar to browse through skill categories.
Click on any skill to view detailed information including experience and resources.
Filter skills by category using the checkboxes.
Use the search box to find specific skills.
Follow breadcrumbs to navigate back up the tree hierarchy.

skillTree.name: Software Engineering
skillTree.description: The complete hierarchy of software engineering skills and technologies, reflecting Alejandro Chang's expertise and experience.

children.name: Core Development Skills
children.description: Fundamental programming skills and principles that are essential for software engineers.

children.name: Languages & Paradigms
children.description: Programming languages and coding approaches that form the foundation of software development.

children.name: JavaScript/TypeScript
children.description: High-level programming languages used primarily for web development, with TypeScript adding static typing to JavaScript.
experience: 15+ years experience with JavaScript, extensive experience with TypeScript.
Led frontend development using TypeScript & React at Intuit.
Developed complex React applications with TypeScript at RBC.
Provided JavaScript/TypeScript consultation at Rangle.io.
Utilized TypeScript for full-stack development (Next.js, Node.js) at Playdly.

children.name: Python
children.description: A versatile programming language known for its readability and extensive libraries, widely used in data science, web development, and automation.
experience: Primary language for AI/ML development and backend services (FastAPI) at Playdly.
Used for scripting and automation tasks in DevOps at Intuit.
Developed data processing pipelines and RESTful APIs.

children.name: Java
children.description: A class-based, object-oriented programming language designed for reliability and platform independence, widely used for enterprise applications.
experience: 15+ years of experience in Java development.
Led development of Spring Boot microservices at Intuit.
Developed J2EE applications at InMoment.
Implemented backend systems at Rethink Solutions.
Core language for backend development at GlocalSpace Inc.

children.name: Shell Scripting
children.description: Scripting for automating tasks in Unix-like operating systems (Bash, Zsh).
experience: Wrote scripts for CI/CD pipelines and deployment automation at Intuit.
Automated system administration tasks.

children.name: Scala
children.description: A general-purpose programming language providing support for functional programming and a strong static type system.
experience: Explored for data processing and concurrent programming.
Familiar with basic syntax and functional concepts.

children.name: Kotlin
children.description: A cross-platform, statically typed, general-purpose programming language with type inference. It is designed to interoperate fully with Java.
experience: Used for Android development experiments.
Familiar with coroutines and null safety features.

children.name: Software Principles & Paradigms
children.description: Fundamental principles and best practices in software design and development, including various programming paradigms.

children.name: SOLID Principles
children.description: A set of object-oriented design principles aimed at making software designs more understandable, flexible, and maintainable.
experience: Applied SOLID principles extensively in Java and TypeScript projects at Intuit and RBC.
Mentored junior developers on applying these principles in daily coding.
Conducted code reviews focusing on adherence to SOLID for maintainability and scalability.

children.name: Clean Code
children.description: A philosophy of writing code that is readable, maintainable, and refactorable.
experience: Championed and enforced clean code practices across teams at Intuit.
Established code quality standards and style guides.
Regularly refactored complex codebases to improve readability and maintainability.

resources.title: Clean Code by Robert C. Martin

children.name: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
children.description: Paradigm based on the concept of 'objects', which can contain data and code: data in the form of fields (often known as attributes or properties), and code, in the form of procedures (often known as methods).
experience: Extensively used in Java (Intuit, RBC, InMoment, Rethink Solutions, GlocalSpace) and TypeScript projects.
Designed and implemented complex class hierarchies and object models.

children.name: Functional Programming
children.description: Paradigm that treats computation as the evaluation of mathematical functions and avoids changing-state and mutable data.
experience: Applied functional programming concepts in JavaScript/TypeScript with React and Redux (RBC, Intuit).
Utilized immutable data structures and pure functions for predictable state management.

children.name: Event-Driven Programming
children.description: Paradigm in which the flow of the program is determined by events such as user actions, sensor outputs, or messages from other programs/threads.
experience: Implemented event-driven architectures in microservices using AWS SQS/SNS at Playdly.
Worked with real-time data streaming using Solace/Kafka at RBC.
Developed responsive UIs in React based on user events.

children.name: Frontend Development
children.description: Skills and technologies related to creating user interfaces and client-side applications.

children.name: UI Technologies
children.description: Core technologies for building user interfaces on the web.

children.name: HTML5/CSS3/Sass
children.description: Modern markup and styling technologies, including CSS preprocessors like Sass, for creating responsive and accessible web pages and applications.
experience: 15+ years of experience building semantic and accessible web interfaces.
Created responsive layouts using Flexbox and Grid for various devices at Intuit and RBC.
Implemented complex animations and transitions using CSS3.
Utilized Sass for modular and maintainable stylesheets at RBC.

children.name: Frontend Frameworks & Libraries
children.description: Libraries and frameworks for building modern, interactive user interfaces.

children.name: React Ecosystem
children.description: React library and its surrounding ecosystem including state management, routing, and component libraries.
experience: Led React development for key features at Intuit.
Engineered responsive trading UIs with React and Redux at RBC.
Developed full-stack applications with React and Next.js at Playdly.
Consulted on React best practices at Rangle.io.
Utilized Storybook for component development and documentation at RBC.

children.name: Angular Ecosystem
children.description: Angular framework and its ecosystem for building enterprise-grade web applications.
experience: Developed enterprise applications using Angular at Rangle.io, providing consultation to clients.
Worked with RxJS for reactive programming in Angular projects.

children.name: Bootstrap/Tailwind CSS
children.description: Popular CSS frameworks for rapid UI development and responsive design.
experience: Utilized Bootstrap for quick prototyping and building responsive UIs in various projects.
Adopted Tailwind CSS for utility-first styling in newer projects at Playdly.

children.name: Backend Development
children.description: Server-side technologies, frameworks, and architectural approaches for building robust application backends.

children.name: API Design & Development
children.description: Designing, building, and maintaining Application Programming Interfaces (APIs).

children.name: REST APIs
children.description: Designing and implementing RESTful APIs adhering to HTTP standards and best practices.
experience: Designed and built scalable RESTful APIs using Spring Boot at Intuit.
Developed REST APIs with Node.js/Express at Resolver.
Created Python-based REST APIs with FastAPI at Playdly.

children.name: GraphQL
children.description: Query language for APIs and a server-side runtime for executing queries by using a type system you define for your data.
experience: Explored GraphQL for flexible data fetching in specific projects.
Familiar with schema design and resolvers.

children.name: gRPC
children.description: A high-performance, open-source universal RPC framework.
experience: Implemented gRPC for inter-service communication at Resolver Inc.

children.name: WebSockets / Real-time Communication
children.description: Technologies for enabling real-time, bidirectional communication between clients and servers.
experience: Engineered real-time data streaming for trading applications using Solace at RBC.

children.name: Backend Frameworks
children.description: Frameworks and runtimes for building server-side applications.

children.name: Spring / Spring Boot (Java)
children.description: Comprehensive framework for building robust Java-based enterprise applications and microservices.
experience: Primary backend framework for microservices at Intuit.
Developed numerous backend systems and APIs using Spring Boot at RBC and previous roles.

children.name: Node.js (Express.js)
children.description: JavaScript runtime and framework for building scalable network applications.
experience: Built RESTful APIs using Express.js at Resolver Inc.
Developed backend services for full-stack JavaScript applications.

children.name: FastAPI (Python)
children.description: Modern, fast (high-performance) web framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+ based on standard Python type hints.
experience: Primary framework for building AI backend services and APIs at Playdly.
Leveraged for its asynchronous capabilities and automatic data validation/serialization.

children.name: Django (Python)
children.description: High-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.
experience: Familiar with Django ORM and admin interface for specific projects.

children.name: Messaging & Event Streaming
children.description: Technologies for asynchronous communication and processing of event streams.

children.name: Kafka
children.description: Distributed event streaming platform.
experience: Used Kafka for event-driven architectures at RBC.

children.name: AWS SQS/SNS
children.description: Managed message queuing (SQS) and notification (SNS) services on AWS.
experience: Utilized SQS and SNS for decoupling microservices and asynchronous task processing at Playdly.

children.name: Solace
children.description: Event streaming and management platform.
experience: Engineered real-time data streaming for trading applications using Solace at RBC.

children.name: Data Management
children.description: Skills related to database design, management, and data processing.

children.name: SQL Databases
children.description: Relational database management systems and SQL proficiency.

children.name: PostgreSQL
children.description: Advanced open-source relational database.
experience: Primary relational database for projects at Playdly and Resolver Inc.
Designed complex schemas, wrote advanced queries, and performed performance tuning.

children.name: MySQL
children.description: Popular open-source relational database.
experience: Used MySQL for backend systems at Rethink Solutions Inc.
Database schema design and query optimization.

children.name: Oracle DB / SQL Server
children.description: Enterprise-grade relational database systems.
experience: Worked with Oracle DB in enterprise application contexts.
Utilized SQL Server at InMoment, Inc., including writing stored procedures.

children.name: NoSQL Databases
children.description: Non-relational database technologies for various data models.

children.name: MongoDB
children.description: Popular NoSQL document database.
experience: Utilized MongoDB for flexible schema requirements in Node.js applications.
Document data modeling and aggregation framework.

children.name: Redis
children.description: In-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache, and message broker.
experience: Implemented Redis for caching and session management at Playdly to improve performance.
Used for real-time data scenarios.

children.name: Cassandra
children.description: Distributed NoSQL database designed for high availability and scalability.
experience: Explored Cassandra for large-scale data storage requirements.

children.name: DynamoDB (AWS)
children.description: Managed NoSQL key-value and document database on AWS.
experience: Used DynamoDB in AWS-based projects for serverless applications.
NoSQL data modeling for DynamoDB.

children.name: Elasticsearch
children.description: Distributed search and analytics engine.
experience: Integrated Elasticsearch for advanced search capabilities in applications.
Familiar with indexing and querying.

children.name: Vector Databases (Pinecone)
children.description: Databases optimized for storing and querying vector embeddings, crucial for AI/ML applications.
experience: Utilized Pinecone for storing and retrieving vector embeddings for the ATLAS RAG system at Playdly.

children.name: DevOps & Infrastructure
children.description: Skills related to cloud platforms, containerization, CI/CD, and infrastructure automation.

children.name: Cloud Platforms (AWS)
children.description: Expertise in Amazon Web Services for deploying and managing scalable applications.
experience: Extensive experience designing, deploying, and managing applications on AWS at Intuit, RBC, and Playdly.
Utilized services like EC2, S3, Lambda, SQS, SNS, DynamoDB, RDS, EKS.
AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional.

children.name: Cloud Platforms (GCP, Azure - Basic)
children.description: Basic familiarity with Google Cloud Platform and Microsoft Azure.
experience: Explored GCP and Azure for specific use cases and comparative analysis.
Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect certified (foundational knowledge).

children.name: Containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
children.description: Using Docker for containerizing applications and Kubernetes for orchestration.
experience: Led Kubernetes adoption and management for CI/CD pipelines at Intuit.
Deployed and managed containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes at Playdly.
Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA).

children.name: CI/CD & Automation
children.description: Implementing Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment pipelines and automation scripts.
experience: Managed and streamlined CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins at Intuit and RBC.
Implemented GitHub Actions for automated workflows at Playdly.
Utilized ArgoCD for GitOps-based continuous delivery.

children.name: Infrastructure as Code (Terraform)
children.description: Managing and provisioning infrastructure through code using tools like Terraform.
experience: Used Terraform for provisioning and managing cloud infrastructure (AWS) at Playdly.

children.name: Monitoring & Observability (Splunk, Gatling)
children.description: Tools and practices for monitoring application performance and health, and ensuring system observability.
experience: Utilized Splunk for log analysis and monitoring at Intuit.
Conducted performance testing using Gatling at Intuit.

children.name: AI & Machine Learning
children.description: Skills in developing and deploying Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning solutions.

children.name: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
children.description: Techniques for enhancing Large Language Models (LLMs) with external knowledge.
experience: Leading development of ATLAS, an advanced AI system enhancing RAG at Playdly.
Designed systems for dynamic embedding model selection and intelligent orchestration for RAG.

children.name: Large Language Models (LLMs) & OpenAI API
children.description: Working with Large Language Models, particularly via the OpenAI API.
experience: Integrated OpenAI API for various AI-driven features at Playdly.
Developed frameworks for dynamic LLM model selection based on task context.

children.name: LangChain
children.description: Framework for developing applications powered by language models.
experience: Utilized LangChain for building complex LLM workflows and agentic systems at Playdly.

children.name: Vector Embeddings & Databases (Pinecone)
children.description: Creating, managing, and querying vector embeddings for similarity search and knowledge retrieval.
experience: Implemented vector storage and retrieval using Pinecone for the ATLAS system at Playdly.

children.name: Prompt Engineering
children.description: Designing and optimizing prompts to elicit desired outputs from LLMs.
experience: Developed sophisticated prompting strategies for various AI tasks at Playdly.

children.name: Security & Compliance
children.description: Practices and tools for ensuring application and infrastructure security and compliance.

children.name: Application Security (Snyk)
children.description: Identifying and mitigating security vulnerabilities in application code and dependencies.
experience: Utilized Snyk for vulnerability scanning and management at Intuit.
